title: ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Biology/Health Science and any three (3) from the following: Nutrition, Chemistry, Physics, Religious Studies, Geography, Economics, Nigerian Language Plus at least a pass in English Language, Food and Nutrition/Home Management.

title: HEALTH INFORMATION MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Biology/Health Science and any two (2) from Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Economics, Religious Knowledge, Nigerian Language.

title: NUTRITION & DIETETICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science and any three (3) of the following:

Food and Nutrition,

Mathematics,

Economics/Commerce,

Physics,

English Language,

Home Management.

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Mathematics are required.
